ModMetaData.name: ArmoredFloors
ModMetaData.author: the_codewarrior
ModMetaData.description: Armor plating for your floors to keep those pesky burrowing bugs out of your base. A bit pricy (4 steel + 2 plasteel), so you won't be paving an entire mountain, but handy late game or when a bit of overhead mountian gets in your.
